OUTSIDE, the laser shell streaks past OBI-WAN to strike t The lightsaber skids across the wet surface of the landin IN THE COCKPIT, BOBA FETT watches as: OUTSIDE, OBI-WAN and JANGO FETT grapple and fight, punchi JANGO FETT rockets down to kick at him. OBI-WAN hauls him OBI-WAN uses Jedi powers to pull part of the structure lo Locked together, OBI-WAN and JANGO FETT plummet down towa OBI-WAN is knocked clear and drops onto a SMALL SERVICE P JANGO FETT rockets up to the landing platform, where he d OUTSIDE, Jango Fett's ship lifts off from the platform an A HAND suddenlt clutches at the very edge of the platform

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Naboo Starship descends, hovers, and land on a bluff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay with the ship, Artoo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ARTOO WHISTLES as ANAKIN and PADME start down the trail t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C-3PO is working outside the homestead. He still lacks an

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good evening. May I help you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, my... oh, my! Master Anakin! My goodness, I can hardly believe it! And this must be Miss Padme.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, Threepio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've come to see my mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, dear! I'm so terribly sorry, Master Annie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio, what's happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we'd better go inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN, PADME and THREEPIO arrive in the courtyard. THREE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Lars - Master Owen! Somebody to see you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OWEN LARS and BERU WHITESUN come out into the courtyard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Anakin Skywalker. I'm here looking for my mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Owen Lars... I guess I'm your step-brother. (they shake hands) This is my girlfriend, Beru.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Padme.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had a feeling you might show up some day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is my mother here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, she's not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLIEGG LARS swings from the house on a small floating cha

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Cliegg Lars. Shmi is my wife... Come on inside. We have a lot to talk about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BERU puts several steaming cups of ardees on a tray and e

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was just before dawn. They came out of nowhere. A hunting party of Tusekn Raiders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLIEGG, OWEN, PADME and ANAKIN sit around the table, BERU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your mother had gone out early, like she always did, to pick mushrooms that grow on the vaporatos. From the tracks, she was about halfway when they took her. Those Tuskens walk like men, but they're vicious, mindless monsters. Thirty of us went out after her. Four of us came back. Three more are still out there looking. I'd be with them, only... I just couldn't ride any more... until I heal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLIEGG grimaces, easing his throbbing leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) This isn't the way I wanted to meet you, son. This isn't how your mother and I planned it. I don't want to give up on her, but she's been gone a month. There's little hope she's lasted this long.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence. Then ANAKIN stands up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To find my mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Annie!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's daed, son. Accept it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can feel her pain, and I will find her. I know she's alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN turns abruptly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN stands looking across the desert. PADME comes runn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are going to have to stay here. These are good people, Padme. You'll be safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take my speeder bike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anakin...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PADME hugs him. ANAKIN walks over to Owen's speeder bike,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I trust you'll watch over her, Owen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN swings onto the bike. The engine fires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I won't be long.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN takes off across the desert. PADME watches him go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The red planet of Geonosis is circled by a large asteroid

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JANGO FETT grins at BOBA FETT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nearly there, son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JANGO FETT guides he ship around the asteroids. Suddenly:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad, look!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the view screen, Obi-Wan's ship appears, chasing after

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hang on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship goes into a power-climb. A GREAT SPACE DDOGFIGHT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ships flip, roll, and turn at incredible speed, didgi Finally, it seems as if OBI-WAN is getting the upper hand In JANGO FETT'S COCKPIT, BOBA FETT flinches as asteroids

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad! Watch out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay calm, son. We'll be fine. That Jedi won't be able to follow us through this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Obi-Wan ship dives into the asteroid belt after them. IN OBI-WAN'S COCKPIT, his skill is pushed to the limit as IN JANGO'S COCKPIT, they see the huge explosion as Obi-Wa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got him! Yeahhhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We won't see him again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOBA FETT laughs. Jango Fett's ship emerges from the aste

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN stands in the middle of a crowd of JAWAS. He asks

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN rides over a large dune toward a small flickering He rides up and stops the bike in front of a campfire. Th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THREE DIFFERENT SHOTS. ANAKIN rids the speeder bike throu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights of the vaporators blink in the night sky. Some

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PADME is pacing the courtyard restlessly. She stops, list

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PADME stands looking at a speeder parked in the garage. S

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please don't leave us, Miss Padme. These people need your help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THREEPIO is parked in a corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not leaving, Threepio. I just can't sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's something I cannot relate to. As a Protocol Droid, I'm either active or inactive. There's no in-between.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess you're lucky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you really think so..? I suppose I shouldn't expect...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not happy here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I'm not unhappy... and my masters here ar so kind I wouldn't wish to trouuble them, it's just... being like this... well, it's embarrassing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Being like what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Naked. If you pardon the expression. You see, when Master Annie made me, he never quite found the time to give me any outer covering. It's so humiliating. How would you like it if you had to go around with all your circuits showing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess I wouldn't like it at all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course you wouldn't. Nobody would. It's simply not protocol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PADME looks thoughtfully at a pile of spare parts and bit

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe we can do something about it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think so. Only Master Annie...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not? They seem to have a box of old coverings here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh? How observant of you, Miss Padme. Of course, I'm just not mechanically minded... if you see what I mean.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PADME picks up a piece of metal and holds it against him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see, if we put this... here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooooh! That's tickles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll have to be quiet, Threepio. Hold still, please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A huge chunk of rock tumbles slowly through the asteroid

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OBI-WAN looks out toward Geonosis and sees in the distanc Obi-Wan's Fighter moves out from the back side of the ast

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Obi-Wan's ship skims across the top of a small mesa along Geonosis is a red rock planet, featureless apart from but The night is quiet, except for an occasional WEIRD CRY. O

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OBI-WAN climbs a steep, narrow trail. Suddenly, a CRY is OBI-WAN listens. Silence. He draws his lightsaber but doe He sets off again and works his way around a narrow corne A SECOND MASSIFF jumps from behind. OBI-WAN swings around

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN pulls up near the edge of a cliff. He gets off the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN creeps through the camp, working his way from hut

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lightsaber completes the hole in the wall. ANAKIN wri A shaft of moonlight from a hole in the roof pierces the He cuts her free, takes her into his arms, and lowers her terribly beaten. Anakin cradles her tenderly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom... Mom... Mom...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHMI'S eyelids flutter - and barely open. They are caked

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annie...? Is it you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHMI'S eyes focus slowly. ANAKIN gives a little choking g

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IВ’m here, Mom. YouВ’re safe. Hang on. IВ’m going to get you out of here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IВ’m so glad... to see you, Annie... Now... I am complete...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just stay with me, Mom. IВ’m going to make you well again. EverythingВ’s going to be fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look so handsome. My son... my grown-up son. IВ’m so proud of you, Annie... so proud... I missed you so much... I love...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHMI dies. ANAKIN draws her to his breast. There is silen

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OBI-WAN arrives at the head of the trail. Far below, a fl OBI-WAN takes a pair of electronic binoculars from his be SLOW PAN with the binoculars, and suddenly a line of Batt

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pale light grows. Thin tendrils of smoke rise slowly As she goes back inside the hut, a TUSKEN CHILD runs past

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OBI-WAN comes running back to his ship and climbs into th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Guiding light" to "old folks home."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOW ANGLE. A line of reflecting pools with splashing foun

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hologram of OBI-WAN flickers in front of a group, made

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Starships from the Trade Federation and the Commerce Guilds are taking deliveries of battle droids from the foundries on Geonosis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's outrageous! The treaty forbids the Trade Federation from building up an army. What are they doing?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The droid foundry seems to be working at full capacity. I am going to go down and investigate. I will bring Jango Fett back home for interrogation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those Geonosian foundries are part of the Techno Union. We will call in their representatives and ask them a few very pointed questions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One more thing. Jango mentioned he was recruited by someone named Darth Tyranus. Any idea who that might be?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the forename Darth, a Sith he must be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our missing apprentice. They are playing their hand at last.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you believe he could be the mysterious Sido-Dyas, who made the deal for the clone army?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps too many pieces are missing from this puzzle, there are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be careful, Obi-Wan. This investigation is becoming less than routine. Do you need help?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me see if I can figure out what's going on first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hologram of OBI-WAN fades off. PALPATINE stares at th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Commerce Guilds are preparing for war... there can be no doubt of that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Count Dooku must have made a treaty with them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We must stop them soon before they're fully ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The debate is over, we need that clone army now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unfortunately, the debate is not over. The Senate will never be able to approve the use of that army before the separatists attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mas Amedda, who had been silent up until now suddenly spe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a crisis! If the Senate votes the Chancellor emergency powers, he could approve the use of the army in a minute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, please, I don't wish to have emergency powers. That's too extreme a solution. It's akin to a dictatorship. We must rely on the Jedi. Master Yoda, how many are available to go to Geonosis?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MACE WINDU and YODA look at one another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two Hundred,... less or more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With all due respect for the Jedi Order, two hundred will be no match for hundreds of thousands of battle droids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patience. We should wait for Obi- Wan to report back. We don't know that Count Dooku has made a treaty with the Corporate Alliance, it's speculation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we must prepare for the worst. I'm going to propose a motion granting emergency powers to the Chancellor at the next session. We must not wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out of the question, Senator! You and I are too closely aligned. The issue will become partisan and debates will begin. The proposal must come from a neutral source.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If only Senator Amidala were here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAR JAR steps forward from the back of the group.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Supreme Chancellor... my august colleagues, I would be proud to propose the motion in question. This is a grave situation, and I'm sure Senator Amidala, and the Queen of Naboo would agree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, Representative Binks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence. Then PALPATINE sighs deeply.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If called upon, I will serve. But it will be the saddest day of my life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All is quiet. BERU comes out of the house. She goes to a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PADME fixes the last piece of covering onto THREEPIO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PADME stands back. OWEN is with her. They look at THREEPI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um. How do I look?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great! You look perfect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perfect? Oh, Miss Padme, I'm so happy! (extending his hand to shake hers) Oh, pardon me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THREEPIO drops his hand and bows formally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He forgets formality and hugs her. PADME hugs him back, l

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (grinning) Well, Padme, I think he should be yours from now on... I know that is what my Mom would want.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, my!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then suddenly, from outside:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come topside, everybody! He's back! He's back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A rough hologram of OBI-WAN is projected onto the garage

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Alliance have pledged their armies to Count Dooku and are forming an... Wait!... ah... attack... I don't... make it... aaaggghhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hologram cuts off. ANAKIN jumps up, agitated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going after him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought the first thing he said was to retransmit his message to Coruscant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, you're right, you're right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN, PADME, ARTOO and THREEPIO leave the homestead, wa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN sits down in the cockpit with PADME. THREEPIO is b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We will deal with Count Dooku. The most important thing for you, Anakin, is to stay where you are. Protect the Senator at all costs. That is your priority.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Understood, Master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hologram switches off. PADME is looking at the readou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll never get there in time to save him. They have to come half way across the galaxy. Look, Geonosis is less than a parsec away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PADME starts to hit buttons and flick switches. ANAKIN pu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he's still alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annie, are you just going to sit here and let him die?? He's your friend... your mentor...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...He's like my father, but you heard Master Windu. He gave me strict orders to stay here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gave you strict orders to protect me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PADME pulls her hand free and flicks more switches. The e

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) ...and I'm going to save Obi-Wan. So if you plan to protect me, you will have to come along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN grins and takes the controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Naboo Starship rises from the bluff and zooms away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TWO HUNDRED JEDI KNIGHTS are assembling outside the huge

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The JEDI COUNCIL are assembled as MACE WINDU makes his pl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The longer we wait, the stronger Dooku's armies become. We cannot wait for the Senate to make up its mind about granting the Chancellor emergency powers, in order to be able to use that clone army... We have the authority to go now. We must go now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All of the JEDI COUNCIL nod their approval.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agreed, Master Windu. Two hundred Jedi send. Enough, let's hope they are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside the great rotunda, the UPROAR is even louder. Oppo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Order! Order!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally, the uproar dies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the regrettable absence of Senator Amidala, the chair recognises Senior Representative of Naboo, Jar Jar Binks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amid the conflicting storm of CHEERS AND BOOS, JAR JAR, w

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Senators, dellow felagates...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laughter. Jeers. JAR JAR blushes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Order! The Senate will accord the Representative the courtesy of a hearing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Comparative quiet. JAR JAR grips the edge of the podium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In response to the direct threat to the Republic from the Confederacy of Independent Systems, I propose that the Senate gives immediate emergency powers to the Supreme Chancellor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uproar. JAR JAR looks a little sheepish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Who can deny these are exceptional times? Exceptional times demand exceptional measures! Exceptional measures demand exceptional men!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We won't support a dictator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHOUTS of agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is the sentiment every one of us agrees with! And when the shadow of war has dispersed and the bright day of liberty has dawned once again, the power we now give to the Supreme Chancellor will be gladly, and swiftly returned. Out ancient liberties will be restored to us, burnished even more brightly than before!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brief silence, then a rolling wave of APPLAUSE. JAR JAR b PALPATINE rises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is with great reluctance that I have agreed to this calling. I love democracy... I love the Republic. The fact that this crisis is demanding I be given absolute power to tule over you is evident. But I am mild by nature and have no desire to destroy the democratic process. The power you give me I will lay down when this crisis has abated, I promise you. And all I ask in return is when my current term of office is over, you allow me to reture and live out my life in peace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We shall proceed to the vote. All those in favor of granting emergency powers to the Supreme Chancellor, signal ate at this time... those opposed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Naboo Starship heads toward the rings of Geonosis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Naboo Starship lands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN switches off the engines. ARTOO and THREEPIO are i

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To find Obi-Wan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN gets up and goes over to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! You're not!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs her arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let go of me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not letting you go out there. It's too dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's my job to protect you. I said it's too dangerous. You're not going, and that's final!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you give me orders, Annie! I'm a Senator of the Galactic Republic. You have no authority to contain me, restrain me, or direct me! You remember your place, young man. (standing up) Now you can come along and protect me or stay here. It's up to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PADME storms out of the cockpit of the Naboo Starfighter. ARTOO BEEPS and WHISTLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, it is, Artoo. Most confusing. One moment they're generating a pleasant mutual attraction and the next, waves of violent hostility. Even though I'm programmed to understand them, I doubt if I ever shall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ARTOO WHISTLES a plaintive sigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN and PADME enter the stalagmite city. They stop, lo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in a low voice) It's empty!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They start forward. As they pass, the surface of the pill

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN and PADME cross the square, reaching the middle. T

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TWENTY WINGED GEONOSIANS carrying weapons alight on the f The GEONOSIANS part, and COUNT DOOKU appears. He bows cou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Senator Amidala, I've heard so much about you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Count Dooku, I assume.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm delighted to meet you at last. We have a great deal to discuss, Senator. I hope you can keep your young Jedi under control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry he's housebroken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COUNT DOOKU sits at a large conference table with PADME o side. ANAKIN stands behind her with FOUR GEONOSIANS GUARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are holding a Jedi Knight, Obi- Wan Kenobi. I am formally requesting you turn him over to me, now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has been convicted of espionage, Senator, and will be executed. In just a few hours, I believe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COUNT DOOKU smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is an officer of the Republic. You can't do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't recognise the Republic here, Senator. But if Naboo were to join our Alliance, I could easily hear your plea for clemency.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN grabs his lightsaber but doesn't turn it on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And if I don't join your rebellion, I assume this Jedi with me will also die?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't wish to make you to join our cause against your will, Senator, but you are a rational, honest representative of your people and I assume you want to do what's in their best interest. Aren't you fed up with the corruption, the bureaucrats, the hypocrisy of it all?.. Aren't you? Be honest, Senator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ideals are still alive, Count, even if the institution is failing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You believe in the same ideals we believe in! The same ideals we are striving to make prominent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If what you say is true, you should stay in the Republic and help Chancellor Palpatine put things right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chancellor means well, M'Lady but he is incompetent. He has promised to cut the bureaucracy, but the bureaucrats are stronger than ever, no? Senator, the Republic cannot be fixed. It is time to start over. The democratic process in the Republic is a sham, a shell game played on the voters. It will not be long before the cult of greed, called the Republic, will lose even the pretext of democracy and freedom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I cannot believe that. I will not forsake all I have honoured and worked for and betray the Republic. I know of your treaties with the Trade Federation, the Commerce Guilds, and the others, Count. What is happening here is not government that has been bought out by business... it's business becoming government!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you willing to betray your Jedi friends? Without your co-operation I can do nothing to stop their execution.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is to happen to me? Am I to be executed also?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wouldn't think of such an offence. But, there are individuals who have a strong interest in your demise, M'lady. It has nothing to do with politics, I'm afraid. It's purely personal, and they have already paid great sums to have you assassinated. I'm sure they will push hard to have you included in the executions. I'm sorry but if you are not going to co-operate, I must turn you over to the Geonosians for justice. I've done all I can for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JANGO FETT moves over to ANAKIN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take that weapon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN hesitates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You may cause a lot of bloodshed, my young Jedi, but you will not escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anakin...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN hands his lightsaber over to JANGO FETT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANAKIN and PADME are standing in the centre of what looks

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have been charged and found guilty of Espionage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have anything to say before your sentence is carried out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are committing an act of war, Archduke. I hope you are prepared for the consequences.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POGGLE laughs. COUNT DOOKU simply smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We build weapons, Senator... that is our business! Of course we're prepared!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get on with it. Carry out the sentence. I want to see her suffer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your other Jedi friend is waiting for you, Senator. Take them to the arena!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FOUR GUARDS take hold of PADME and ANAKIN. They are escor

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the gloomy tunnel, ANAKIN and PADME are tossed into an The DRIVER gets up onto his seat.

dialogues.text: I love you.

dialogues.text: You love me?! I thought we decided not to fall in love. That we would be forced to live a lie. That it would destroy our lives...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have no desire to be cured of this love either. Long or short, I vow to spend the rest of my life with you.
